desc: A type defining a node id selector (which means the strategy to make the 'select' which gives the node on which the associated blocks will be executed)

definition.label: pool
definition.desc: Pool of the Node the 'select' will target

definition.label: criterion
definition.desc: EK::Criterion of the Node the 'select' will target

definition.label: identifier
definition.desc: EK::Criterion Identifier of the Node the 'select' will target

definition.label: queuing
definition.desc: EK::Criterion corresponding to NoQueuing or WithoutQueuing APIs but opposite value (NOT or !)

definition.label: timeout
definition.desc: EK::Criterion corresponding to Timeout or WithTimeout APIs
